General.Name: Fujian Foxit Software Development Joint Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Foxit Software Development Joint Stock Co., Ltd. develops PDF electronic document solutions worldwide. The company offers various solutions, such as document generation, conversion, display, editing, search, printing, storage, sealing, form, protection, and secure distribution management, as well as software development platform and tools, and enterprise document automation solutions. It also provides PDF readers, PDF product suites, PDF development tools, and industry solutions, as well as online services. It serves publishing, finance, fabricate, IT communication, energy, chemical, and food and medicine industries, as well as government and law firms. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Fuzhou, China.
